attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn more about Trump 2020 and IMAGINE MY SURPRISE when this app told me to kill myself and get out of this country.... I was so appalled that I uninstalled the app. 0/5 stars.
attributes.title: This app told me to kill myself 😢😖

attributes.review: The worst news app EVER!! It’s all fake, nothings true, this is very very bad! Not good at all! I get the sense that’s it’s really only meant for people that are indeed in this cult... do not recommend 0/5 🧚🏾‍♀️😌
attributes.title: Fake news ✨

attributes.review: not sure how this even made it to the app store in the first place. i’ve never been more disgusted in my life. i would not recommend this app it makes me want to run for president just so i can pass a law that bans it forever. this is 100% not for tik tok and i am definitely not a salty gen z who would not know what to do when they are bored if tik tok got deleted.
attributes.title: bro how

attributes.review: When I downloaded the app I was disappointed that all I saw was trump and his nasty supporters😒.I give the app a 1/5 because it has trump over it
attributes.title: Take it off

attributes.review: My phone began running so slow after installing to keep track of Mr President & his plans. I feel he was using it to collect data like he claims TikTok does🤯
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: This app is so terrible, the app kept crashing and made my iPhone restart many times. I suggest people to not download this app for safety purposes. And plus Donald trump is a racist and a rapist.
attributes.title: Horrible

attributes.review: I open the app and it did not work. Logged it and it just logged me off it is terrible I do not recommend.
attributes.title: I do not recommend

attributes.review: This app is terrible and it doesn’t work good at all it keeps messing with my phone. 😡 they should just remove it.!
attributes.title: The app shouldn’t even exist

attributes.review: Continuously making my phones crash,glitches and overall is a nuscence
attributes.title: Horrible app

attributes.review: It sucked big time,also didn’t learn anything that he wants to do in 2020,also made my phone crash
attributes.title: ✨Sucked✨
